summary:
This mod gives you new custom sword (1H), greatsword (2H), bow, arrows and
a shield.
descriptionHtml:
This mod gives you new custom sword (1H), greatsword (2H), bow, arrows and a shield.

The main focus for its existance is that I wanted to create different objects
which were sort of similar for texturing.
I tried different setups, approaches and effects to see what the result
would be in the game.
This is it and while themed quality differ somewhat from item to item.

Played around with the textures, normalmaps, glow, effects, different scales and more.
Got most to work perfectly fine but not to space out too much this is
what you get :)

The reason for low texture on bow, quiver and inside of shield is me trying
the threshold before it starts looking ugly.
Reaver and arrow use the same effects as the dawnbreaker sword but I also
tried other effects (like the one on daedric equipment) but never got it
to look good enough.



The Backstory:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Long lost smithing knowledge, written on parchement barely able to retain its
form have found its way to the Dovahkiin.
Weapons of imense power that shadow even that of daedric nature, long
lost to the innhabitants of Tamriel for as long as anyone remembers.

All require only the best of materials and while some pages are gone
it also explain the method of infusing the bladed weapons with strong souls to
make them even stronger.
You could create basic weaponry using patience and skill.
Or... infuse it with a soul to phase the blade, existing in the same plane
as souls of the dead that still haunt the living?
Or... attach a ruby of perfect quality to focus the soul energy to flow across
the surface of the blade, making it to a deadly reaver?

Now, you, possess the instructions needed but will your skill be strong enough?



Important notes:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
All items are only slightly better than the Daedric counterpart.
All items are classified as ebony at the forge.
Note that the Ghost and Reaver items also need Arcane Smithing skill.
Lorefriendly and balanced if you buy the backstory :)
Bow, Quiver and inside of shield have fairly low texture quality.
If you wish to edit or change anything with the creationkit all my items
are named BBD...

Item list with ID is listed in the readme file if you wish to use the additem command.



================================================================================
Installation
================================================================================
Copy the BBD_Widowmaker.esp and BBD_Widowmaker.bsa and place it in
the Skyrim data folder.
(C:\Program Files\Steam\SteamApps\common\Skyrim\data)
Make sure it is selected during load.
